item.title: EP 157 - Marty McFly Vs. September 11th
item.itunes:title: Marty McFly Vs. September 11th
item.description:
A series of mysterious phone calls leads to an unspeakable crime, and then we take a look at the theory that the “Back To The Future” predicted 9/11.

Dorothy Jane Scott was just a young woman living her life until she got a series of threatening phone calls. And even after her disappearance, the calls continued . . .

And then we look at the conspiracy known as “The McFly Code.” Are there really hidden messages in the “Back To The Future” movies that warned us about 9/11 and, even stranger still, did Marty McFly not just travel through time but into different movies?!

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

 

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

 

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

WHEN I GET YOU ALONE, I WILL CUT YOU UP INTO BITS

https://www.horrorgalore.com/true-story/when-i-get-you-alone-i-will-cut-you-bits

 

Murder of Dorothy Jane Scott

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Murder_of_Dorothy_Jane_Scott

 

CODE YOU THE FUTURE - Back to the Future codes 30 years of events - 9/11, OBAMA, TRUMP...

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vRLQgSfR4Fw

 

BACK TO THE FUTURE predicts 9/11

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P1ULjJ3EqyY&index=75&list=WL&t

 

Going Online in the Age of Conspiracy Theories

https://www.theatlantic.com/technology/archive/2015/10/going-online-in-the-age-of-conspiracy-theories/411544/

 

"Back to the Future Predicts 9/11" Filmmaker Explains What Makes Robert Zemeckis A Cosmic Pre-Cog

https://www.player.one/back-future-predicts-911-filmmaker-explains-what-makes-robert-zemeckis-cosmic-pre-cog-468460

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

 

------------------------------------------------

 

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Twitter: @JasonOCarpenter

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.
